title: Moeen leads England to victory over West Indies and sets up series decider
description: Moeen Ali stars with bat and ball as England beat West Indies in the fourth Twenty20 to level the series 2-2.

title: The storm battering the US East Coast seen from space
description: The US National Oceanic and Atmospheric Administration released satellite footage of the snowstorm.

title: Seven-time Super Bowl winner Brady expected to retire
description: Tom Brady, one of the greatest players in NFL history and the winner of seven Super Bowls, is expected to retire.

title: Freedom Convoy: Why Canadian truckers are protesting in Ottawa
description: The 'Freedom Convoy' is protesting vaccine mandates but police are worried about fringe elements.

title: Downing Street parties: Sue Gray won't wait for police inquiry
description: Sue Gray's report is due "shortly" - but police ask for "minimal references" to certain events.

title: Storm Malik: Gusts up to 80mph hit parts of UK
description: Travel is disrupted in Scotland as high winds and fallen trees lead to cancelled rail services.

title: Doncaster: Boy, 17, and man die in double fatal town centre stabbing
description: A boy of 17 is in custody in connection with the deaths of a teenager and a 21-year-old man.

title: Cyclo-cross hardest type of racing, says Pidcock as he bids for world title
description: Britain's Tom Pidcock says cyclo-cross is the hardest discipline in cycling, as he prepares for his world title bid.

title: Ashleigh Barty wins Australian Open
description: Ashleigh Barty ends the home nation's 44-year wait for a Grand Slam women's singles champion by beating Danielle Collins to win the Australian Open title.

title: Ashley Cole: Man arrested over alleged racist abuse
description: The incident was reported to police during the FA Cup match between Swindon and Manchester City.

title: Ukraine crisis: Russian attack would be 'horrific', US warns
description: Top US General Mark Milley says the build-up of Russian troops is the largest since the Cold War.

title: Ukraine: Boris Johnson to call Vladimir Putin and visit region
description: Boris Johnson wants to "ramp up deterrence to avoid bloodshed" over the Ukraine crisis, No 10 says.

title: Covid: Gray won't wait for police probe and Joni Mitchell in Spotify row
description: Five things you need to know about the coronavirus pandemic this Saturday morning.

title: FA Cup magic hits Bridgwater as WSL high-flyers Man Utd come to town
description: Third-tier Bridgwater are looking to cause an upset when they host Women's Super League heavyweights Manchester United in the fourth round of the FA Cup on Sunday.

title: Rain hurts England's bid to set up unlikely victory push in Ashes Test
description: Rain hurts England's bid to set up an unlikely victory push on day three of the Women's Ashes Test against Australia in Canberra.

title: The Papers: Anger as Met probe impacts Gray partygate inquiry
description: Some papers report on "fury" over the police intervention in Sue Gray's inquiry into alleged No 10 parties.

title: Joni Mitchell wants songs off Spotify in Covid row
description: The singer asks that her songs are removed from the platform in protest against Covid misinformation.

title: Covid: Posts claiming only 17,000 died of virus 'factually incorrect'
description: A YouTube video that tried to vastly underplay the number of UK Covid deaths has been condemned.

title: Artists open up John Peel's historic vinyl collection
description: Damon Albarn and Nubya Garcia discover the late DJ John Peel's astonishing collection of vinyl.

title: Actors from tiny Manchester theatre step into TV spotlight
description: The cast of a musical from a 120-seat venue take centre stage in a televised theatrical extravaganza.

title: Long Covid: Hidden lung damage spotted on scans
description: A study detected abnormalities in people who had had Covid but did not need hospital treatment.

title: Ros Atkins on... the rising cost of living
description: Ros Atkins explains why households are being hit by rising prices and why it is likely to get worse.

title: Peter Tatchell on his life-long fight for gay rights
description: Peter Tatchell's high-profile activism has seen him take on archbishops, presidents and boxers.

title: Beating Retreat: British hymn 'Abide with Me' causing a stir in India
description: India has dropped a colonial-era tune from Beating Retreat celebrations to "decolonise" the event.

title: 'I fear bumping into my torturers in the street'
description: Syrian refugees saw Europe as a sanctuary - but now some are afraid of coming face to face with their torturers.

title: Sri Lanka to Coalisland: 'We felt like only people of colour in our town'
description: The story of two adopted siblings from Sri Lanka who were brought up in a rural town in Northern Ireland.

title: EV1: How an electric car dream was crushed
description: When the EV1 was cancelled, many thought the electric car era was over. But its death inspired Tesla

title: The Critics Company: Nigerian teenagers who became sci-fi sensations
description: The group of friends from Kaduna borrowed smartphones from family members and made tripods out of wood.

title: Week in pictures: 22 - 28 January 2022
description: A selection of images from all over the globe, taken this week.
